mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T2_PACKAGE_APP_TBL (PACKAGE_NAME, ROOM_NO, RENT_NO, LEISURE_NO) VALUES (#{packageName}, #{selectRoom}, #{selectRent}, #{selectLeisure})
mapper.update: UPDATE T2_PACKAGE_REQUEST_TBL SET STATE = 'A' WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T2_PACKAGE_REQUEST_TBL P INNER JOIN T2_ROOM_TBL S ON S.ROOM_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO INNER JOIN T2_STAY_TBL S1 ON S.STAY_NO = S1.STAY_NO WHERE PRODUCT_KIND = 'STAY';

SELECT * FROM T2_PACKAGE_APP_TBL P INNER JOIN T2_LEISURE_TBL L ON P.LEISURE_NO = L.LEISURE_NO INNER JOIN T2_RENT_CAR_TBL R ON P.RENT_NO = R.RENT_NO INNER JOIN T2_ROOM_TBL S ON P.ROOM_NO = S.ROOM_NO INNER JOIN T2_STAY_TBL S1 ON S.STAY_NO = S1.STAY_NO
